heading: HB08311
0: AN ACT CREATING THE SOLAR ENERGY DEVELOPMENT CENTER AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08311
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE SOLAR ENERGY DEVELOPMENT CENTER AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to establish the Solar Energy Development Center that shall serve as the leading institution concerned with the research on solar energy; the development of technologies needed for the utilization of solar energy; the implementation of government program on the allocation, distribution, and sale of solar energy; and the promotion of the use, research, and introduction of solar energy-related technologies to the market.
ALIAS NAME : “Solar Energy Development Center Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2018-10-04)2. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-11-19)
3. Malapitan (000 2018-11-27)4. Sandoval (000 2018-11-29)
